sub_title: Senior Data & Strategy Planner | Senior Digital & Data Marketing Consultant
summary:
Digital native or Millennial, I Graduated in Marketing from Kedge Business School and I am a 9 years Digital & Data Marketing/Communications Expert. 

I've joined Epsilon (part of Publicis Group) in 2018 as a Senior Data & Strategy Planner with the objectives to analyze data and digital marketing strategies, to create learnings and insights in order to adapt and better the strategies, to support and find better ways and channels to interact with customers, to attract prospects, to increase engagement, loyalty and awareness and to drive revenue.

I started my career at Deloitte (France and United States) as an Inbound Marketing Expert (Services & BtoB), then joined Reed MIDEM as a Brand Marketing Manager with the responsibility to enhance design, implement the entire marketing and communications tools and to manage the overall client experiences.

I am always happy to talk and hear about new opportunities. Life is a challenge everyday so I'm ready to hear about yours and maybe help you to accomplish them!

certifications.name: TOEIC (Test of English for International Communication) | 915/990

projects.title: Experiential Marketing - Street Marketing
projects.description:
Two main projects: 
• Brand image: Quiksilver concept-store creation: 3D views and project marketing and strategic report
• Street & Buzz Marketing campaigns for Mars Group: concept creation, scenery creation, shooting, marketing experience, social networks buzz & post-campaigns report.

profile_positions.title: Senior Data & Strategy Planner | Senior Digital & Data Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Digital Marketing: 
• Strategies identification thanks to studies, benchmark and marketing reports. Definition off KPIs linked to business goals to highlight and implement areas of improvement. Design of new and innovative marketing actions with dedicated and detailed use cases
• Digital content creation to meet the clients’ and business’ needs (clients-prospects reports, market trends, business’ needs studies, forecasts and reports) and management of the dedicated marketing plans
• Design of acquisitions and retention plans to reach clients and prospects to support and ensure business goals (reputation, engagement, revenues)

 Data Marketing: 
• Audit and plan definition to better the data quality and quantity with follow up of the key indicators of quality (previously built and highlighted). New means of data collection identification and improvement (acquisition strategies, data quality improvements with the support of marketing actions towards clients and prospects, report automatization/data visualization…)
• GDPR, ePrivacy & data regulations: analyses of laws and legal recommendations, use cases and benchmarks, design of improvements thanks to recommendation (based up regulation, business practices, client’s and prospects expectations analysis
• Change Management with business teams to adopt new data tools and applications
profile_positions.title: Digital & Data Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Brand Marketing Management for MIPIM UK & Japan (UK and Japan Real Estate Exhibitions) : 
• Contributing to the strategy by identifying the market trends, creating and promoting new offers, analyzing new offers and clients' and prospects' issues, the exhibitions' positioning and pricing, defining and executing the marketing plan
• Enhancing the digital marketing thanks to the development of dedicated tools (website, social networks, surveys and pools, ...), acquisition campaigns (SEO, SEA, paid searches, display, emailings, advertisement, lead management, ...), mobile application
• Managing content marketing campaigns linked to the trends and clients' expectations (content and key messages and speeches management, management the value proposition)
• Creating communications tools and dedicated print and digital campaigns linked to the media, social media, content and partnerships plans (internally and with agencies)
• Supporting the sales team by developing, creating and tweaking the sales tools for account managers and representatives
• Analyzing the performance of the marketing campaigns and activities (budget follow-up and management, KPI identification and analysis, client satisfaction, sales analysis and pricing adjustment if needed)
profile_positions.title: Brand Marketing Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
France CFO Program Marketing:
• Creating & managing the France CFO Program marketing strategy (BtoB & services marketing)
• Contributing to the development of the European marketing initiatives for the CFOs from the top French Companies (CAC40 & SBF120)
• Building eminence and relationships between Deloitte and its clients
• Developing marketing activities around the CFOs'​ key and hot topics (inbound marketing, client experience & loyalty program)
• Creating & Managing marketing campaigns focused on CFOs' interests (services marketing: CRM, user experience, messaging, brand image, digital marketing, thoughtware, ...)
profile_positions.title: Marketing & Communications Specialist

profile_positions.description:
From Paris to Chicago I've supported during a year the French and US Senior Marketing Manager in charge of all the marketing towards Chief Financial Officers. My responsibilities were directly linked to the digital challenges for Deloitte France and USA regarding the marketing activities created for the CFOs.

U.S. CFO Program & Center for Corporate Governance:
• Analyzing the digital marketing campaigns: ROIs, KPIs & Key Takeaways
• Social and Digital Benchmarks and analysis of the U.S. CFO Program presence
• Preparing the website migration (audit of the CFO Program & Finance Transformation pages)
• Updating the marketing tools
• Carrying out the preparation of the national events (Directors' Series)

Deloitte France CFO Program & Solutions:
• Creating and monitoring the Deloitte's map of solutions
• Marketing proposals for the Partners' business solutions
• Carrying out on a regular basis inter-functions benchmarks
• Following up the different evolutions of the CFO Community

• Statistical processing, analysis and synthesis of the results & recommandations

Communications Manager: 
• Creating and implementing of the Communications program 
• Managing the Website
